SELECT up.id_uprivada id_estado_cuenta, ui.id_uinmobiliaria, ui.nombre_corto, ui.nombre_largo, ui.des_direccion, ui.ubigeo, up.id_uprivada, up.tipo_unidad, up.numeracion, up.zona, p.id_persona, p.tipo_documento, p.num_documento, p.nombre, p.primer_apellido, p.segundo_apellido, p.fecha_nacimiento,
IFNULL((SELECT sum(d.monto) total_monto FROM cuota c INNER JOIN detalle d ON c.id_cuota = d.id_cuota GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada ),0) total_cargo,
IFNULL((SELECT sum(a.monto_abono) total_abonado FROM cuota c INNER JOIN abono a ON c.id_cuota = a.id_cuota GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada),0) total_abono,
IFNULL((SELECT sum(d.monto) total_monto FROM cuota c INNER JOIN detalle d ON c.id_cuota = d.id_cuota GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada ),0) -
IFNULL((SELECT sum(a.monto_abono) total_abonado FROM cuota c INNER JOIN abono a ON c.id_cuota = a.id_cuota WHERE a.validado = 1 GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada),0) total_deuda
FROM unidadprivada up INNER JOIN unidadinmobiliaria ui ON up.id_uinmobiliaria = ui.id_uinmobiliaria INNER JOIN persona_up pup ON up.id_uprivada = pup.id_uprivada INNER JOIN persona p ON pup.id_persona = p.id_persona WHERE pup.id_tipo_relacion = 1 AND up.id_uprivada = #{id}
